name: com.zigurous.importer.cc0textures
description:
The CC0 Textures Importer package provides an editor integration for importing textures and materials directly from ambientcg.com (formerly cc0textures.com).

Texture Maps:
• Albedo
• Normal
• Displacement
• Roughness
• Metallic
• Occlusion
• Emission

Texture Resolutions:
• 1K
• 2K
• 4K
• 8K
• 16K

Image Formats:
• JPG
• PNG
